name: Golden Phoenix Model Ontology
label: GPM-CORE
description: An ontology formalizing the conceptual architecture of the Golden Phoenix Model, a fault-tolerant constitutional design framework integrating systems theory, institutional distrust, Nash equilibrium stabilization, and post-conflict governance principles.
